title: leaverbuster
body: leauge of legends crashes and i get punished with 20 mins afk. I'm so tired of this game..

replies.body: The first time you afk you get only a warning, and after that it's 5 minutes + 5 minutes each time after that up to 20. If you are at a 20 minute LPQ already, that means it has happened several times before. If you are having issues with crashes or disconnections you can seek troubleshooting assistance here and through Riot's support knowledgebase or Player Support. Please try to fix those issues before playing more, because as much as you think it's unfair for you to get a penalty, it's more unfair for your team to lose a player. You can read more about Leaver Buster here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

DTN brought up some good points. You'll definitely want to get the crashing resolved before it causes more penalties for you. The most common reason for crashes is because of an unstable connection to the servers. Our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over the most common solutions. However, if you're seeing [bugsplats](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) or graphical issues, it's likely the issue is caused by drivers or corrupt/missing game assets. 

Let me know if this helped.
